title: Geothermal Fulfilling 1.1 Percent of 2020 Clean Power Goal for Los Angeles
text:
02 Geothermal Fulfilling 1.1 Percent of 2020 Clean Power Goal for Los Angeles 
Renewable Energy World: Power produced by the recently expanded Don A. Campbell geothermal plant in Mineral County, Nev., now represents 1.1 percent of the Los Angeles Department of Water and Powerâ€™s (LADWP) 33 percent by 2020 clean energy goal, the utility said on Sept. 29.Ormat Technologies in August completed construction of the plant expansion, and the company said commercial operation of the new facility began on Sept. 17.
